channel.title: A command only being used once?
channel.description:
A command such as ::pure
How can i make these so it can only be used once?

item.title: A command only being used once?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Heres something simple i came up with

[code]f (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(,*); //add your own items here
sendMessage(“Starter package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " has allready has a starter package… :p");

        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: A command only being used once?

item.title: A command only being used once?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Make a boolean in the characters file, have it load on startup, and save when they log out or use the command.
